text: The Greatest Show on Turf was the nickname for the offense fielded by the St. Louis Rams offense during 1999, 2000, and 2001 National Football League seasons. ==Players== *Kurt Warner - Quarterback *Marshall Faulk - Running back *Isaac Bruce - Wide receiver *Torry Holt - Wide receiver *Az-Zahir Hakim - Wide receiver *Ricky Proehl - Wide receiver == Other websites == *?.com: Best Offense of All Time *ESPN.com: Readers List of Best Offenses of All Time *Fantasy Football Bookmarks: The Greatest Show on Turf Category:St. Louis Rams Category:1999 in sports Category:2000 in sports Category:2001 in sports
title: The Greatest Show on Turf
